TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CallContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供与执行代码路径一起传送的属性集。

span.span: Provides a set of properties that are carried with the execution code path.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 专用集合对象，它类似于方法调用的线程本地存储，并提供对每个逻辑执行线程唯一的数据槽。 is a specialized collection object similar to a Thread Local Storage for method calls and provides data slots that are unique to each logical thread of execution. 不会在其他逻辑线程上跨调用上下文共享槽。The slots are not shared across call contexts on other logical threads. 当对象向下移动并备份执行代码路径，并沿着路径按各个对象检查时，可以将对象添加到中。Objects can be added to the as it travels down and back up the execution code path, and examined by various objects along the path. 当远程方法调用另一个中的对象时 ， 类将生成一个 与远程调用一起传输的实例。When a remote method call is made to an object in another , the class generates a instance that travels along with the remote call. 只有公开 接口并存储在中的对象才 会传播到中的外部 。Only objects that expose the interface and are stored in the are propagated outside the in a . 不支持此接口的对象不在 具有远程方法调用的实例中传输。Objects that do not support this interface are not transmitted in instances with remote method calls. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有方法 都是静态的，并且在当前的调用上下文中运行 。All methods in are static and operate on the call context in the current . > [!NOTE] > 此类发出链接请求。This class makes a link demand. `SecurityException`如果直接调用方没有基础结构权限，则会引发。A `SecurityException` is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) 。See [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将 [主体和标识对象](/dotnet/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects) 传输到远程位置以进行标识。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to transmit [Principal and Identity Objects](/dotnet/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects) to a remote location for identification. 若要查看 `LogicalCallContextData` 此示例中使用的类的代码，请参阅接口的示例 。To view the code for the `LogicalCallContextData` class used in this sample, see the example for the interface. 若要查看 `HelloServiceClass` 此示例中使用的类的代码，请参阅方法的示例 。To view the code for the `HelloServiceClass` class used in this sample, see the example for the method. 若要查看此示例中使用的服务器类的代码，请参阅类的示例 。To view the code for the server class used in this sample, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/VB/client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个客户端，该客户端在远程对象上调用一个方法，该方法显示从逻辑线程返回的已命名数据槽的值，并释放该命名的数据槽。The following code example shows a client creating a named data slot, calling a method on the remote object that displays the value of the named data slot that was returned from the logical thread, and frees that named data slot. [!code-cpp[CallContext_GetHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext_GetHeaders/CPP/callcontext_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CallContext_GetHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext_GetHeaders/CS/callcontext_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CallContext_GetHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext_GetHeaders/VB/callcontext_client.vb#1)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将标头发送到远程方法，并在远程方法返回时将这些标头的内容打印到控制台。The following code example sends headers to a remote method and prints the content of those headers to the console when the remote method returns.
